text.ascii: bhISma uvAca
text.ur: bhīṣma uvāca

text.ascii: kalAMzAs tAta yujyante muhUrtAz ca dinAni ca
text.ur: kalāṁśās tāta yujyante muhūrtāś ca dināni ca

text.ascii: ardhamAsAz ca mAsAz ca nakSatrANi grahAs tathA
text.ur: ardhamāsāś ca māsāś ca nakṣatrāṇi grahās tathā

text.ascii: Rtavaz cApi yujyante tathA saMvatsarA api
text.ur: r̥tavaś cāpi yujyante tathā saṁvatsarā api

text.ascii: evaM kAlavibhAgena kAlacakraM pravartate
text.ur: evaṁ kālavibhāgena kālacakraṁ pravartate

text.ascii: teSAM kAlAtirekeNa jyotiSAM ca vyatikramAt
text.ur: teṣāṁ kālātirekeṇa jyotiṣāṁ ca vyatikramāt

text.ascii: paJcame paJcame varSe dvau mAsAv upajAyataH
text.ur: pañcame pañcame varṣe dvau māsāv upajāyataḥ

text.ascii: teSAm abhyadhikA mAsAH paJca dvAdaza ca kSapAH
text.ud: तेषामभ्यधिका मासाः पञ्च द्वादश च क्षपाः
text.ur: teṣām abhyadhikā māsāḥ pañca dvādaśa ca kṣapāḥ

text.ascii: trayodazAnAM varSANAm iti me vartate matiH
text.ur: trayodaśānāṁ varṣāṇām iti me vartate matiḥ

text.ascii: sarvaM yathAvac caritaM yad yad ebhiH parizrutam
text.ur: sarvaṁ yathāvac caritaṁ yad yad ebhiḥ pariśrutam

text.ascii: evam etad dhruvaM jJAtvA tato bIbhatsur AgataH
text.ur: evam etad dhruvaṁ jñātvā tato bībhatsur āgataḥ

text.ascii: sarve caiva mahAtmAnaH sarve dharmArthakovidAH
text.ur: sarve caiva mahātmānaḥ sarve dharmārthakovidāḥ

text.ascii: yeSAM yudhiSThiro rAjA kasmAd dharme 'parAdhnuyuH
text.ur: yeṣāṁ yudhiṣṭhiro rājā kasmād dharme ’parādhnuyuḥ

text.ascii: alubdhAz caiva kaunteyAH kRtavantaz ca duSkaram
text.ur: alubdhāś caiva kaunteyāḥ kr̥tavantaś ca duṣkaram

text.ascii: na cApi kevalaM rAjyam iccheyus te 'nupAyataH
text.ur: na cāpi kevalaṁ rājyam iccheyus te ’nupāyataḥ

text.ascii: tadaiva te hi vikrAntum ISuH kauravanandanAH
text.ur: tadaiva te hi vikrāntum īṣuḥ kauravanandanāḥ

text.ascii: dharmapAzanibaddhAs tu na celuH kSatriyavratAt
text.ur: dharmapāśanibaddhās tu na celuḥ kṣatriyavratāt

text.ascii: yac cAnRta iti khyAyed yac ca gacchet parAbhavam
text.ur: yac cānr̥ta iti khyāyed yac ca gacchet parābhavam

text.ascii: vRNuyur maraNaM pArthA nAnRtatvaM kathaM cana
text.ur: vr̥ṇuyur maraṇaṁ pārthā nānr̥tatvaṁ kathaṁ cana

text.ascii: prApte tu kAle prAptavyaM notsRjeyur nararSabhAH
text.ur: prāpte tu kāle prāptavyaṁ notsr̥jeyur nararṣabhāḥ

text.ascii: api vajrabhRtA guptaM tathAvIryA hi pANDavAH
text.ud: अपि वज्रभृता गुप्तं तथावीर्या हि पाण्डवाः
text.ur: api vajrabhr̥tā guptaṁ tathāvīryā hi pāṇḍavāḥ

text.ascii: pratiyudhyAma samare sarvazastrabhRtAM varam
text.ur: pratiyudhyāma samare sarvaśastrabhr̥tāṁ varam

text.ascii: tasmAd yad atra kalyANaM loke sadbhir anuSThitam
text.ur: tasmād yad atra kalyāṇaṁ loke sadbhir anuṣṭhitam

text.ascii: tat saMvidhIyatAM kSipraM mA no hy artho 'tigAt parAn
text.ur: tat saṁvidhīyatāṁ kṣipraṁ mā no hy artho ’tigāt parān

text.ascii: na hi pazyAmi saMgrAme kadA cid api kaurava
text.ud: न हि पश्यामि संग्रामे कदाचिदपि कौरव
text.ur: na hi paśyāmi saṁgrāme kadā cid api kaurava

text.ascii: ekAntasiddhiM rAjendra saMprAptaz ca dhanaMjayaH
text.ur: ekāntasiddhiṁ rājendra saṁprāptaś ca dhanaṁjayaḥ

text.ascii: saMpravRtte tu saMgrAme bhAvAbhAvau jayAjayau
text.ur: saṁpravr̥tte tu saṁgrāme bhāvābhāvau jayājayau

text.ascii: avazyam ekaM spRzato dRSTam etad asaMzayam
text.ur: avaśyam ekaṁ spr̥śato dr̥ṣṭam etad asaṁśayam

text.ascii: tasmAd yuddhAvacarikaM karma vA dharmasaMhitam
text.ur: tasmād yuddhāvacarikaṁ karma vā dharmasaṁhitam

text.ascii: kriyatAm Azu rAjendra saMprApto hi dhanaMjayaH
text.ur: kriyatām āśu rājendra saṁprāpto hi dhanaṁjayaḥ

text.ascii: duryodhana uvAca
text.ur: duryodhana uvāca

text.ascii: nAhaM rAjyaM pradAsyAmi pANDavAnAM pitAmaha
text.ur: nāhaṁ rājyaṁ pradāsyāmi pāṇḍavānāṁ pitāmaha

text.ascii: yuddhAvacArikaM yat tu tac chIghraM saMvidhIyatAm
text.ur: yuddhāvacārikaṁ yat tu tac chīghraṁ saṁvidhīyatām

text.ascii: bhISma uvAca
text.ur: bhīṣma uvāca

text.ascii: atra yA mAmakI buddhiH zrUyatAM yadi rocate
text.ud: अत्र या मामकी बुद्धिः श्रूयतां यदि रोचते
text.ur: atra yā māmakī buddhiḥ śrūyatāṁ yadi rocate

text.ascii: kSipraM balacaturbhAgaM gRhya gaccha puraM prati
text.ud: क्षिप्रं बलचतुर्भागं गृह्य गच्छ पुरं प्रति
text.ur: kṣipraṁ balacaturbhāgaṁ gr̥hya gaccha puraṁ prati

text.ascii: tato 'paraz caturbhAgo gAH samAdAya gacchatu
text.ur: tato ’paraś caturbhāgo gāḥ samādāya gacchatu

text.ascii: vayaM tv ardhena sainyena pratiyotsyAma pANDavam
text.ur: vayaṁ tv ardhena sainyena pratiyotsyāma pāṇḍavam

text.ascii: matsyaM vA punar AyAtam atha vApi zatakratum
text.ur: matsyaṁ vā punar āyātam atha vāpi śatakratum

text.ascii: AcAryo madhyatas tiSThatv azvatthAmA tu savyataH
text.ur: ācāryo madhyatas tiṣṭhatv aśvatthāmā tu savyataḥ

text.ascii: kRpaH zAradvato dhImAn pArzvaM rakSatu dakSiNam
text.ur: kr̥paḥ śāradvato dhīmān pārśvaṁ rakṣatu dakṣiṇam

text.ascii: agrataH sUtaputras tu karNas tiSThatu daMzitaH
text.ur: agrataḥ sūtaputras tu karṇas tiṣṭhatu daṁśitaḥ

text.ascii: ahaM sarvasya sainyasya pazcAt sthAsyAmi pAlayan
text.ur: ahaṁ sarvasya sainyasya paścāt sthāsyāmi pālayan
